title: Water quality indicators influencing the formation and morphology of hydrostatically-formed photogranules
content:

Cynthia J Castro, Wenye Camilla Kuo-Dahab, Tao Jiang, Samuel Downes, Guoping Zhang, Ahmed S. Abouhend, Caitlyn S. Butler
Hydrostatic photogranulation represents an intriguing phenomenon with potential applications in aeration-free wastewater treatment. In this process, activated sludge batches transform into photogranules, manifesting as either spherical or disk-dominated shapes. Yet,...
